snippet: At an informal news briefing on Tuesday morning, Demos Parneros, president for United States retail at Staples, said the company is "optimistic" about the 2012 back-to-school shopping season.
abstract: At an informal news briefing on Tuesday morning, Demos Parneros, president for United States retail at Staples, said the company is "optimistic" about the 2012 back-to-school shopping season.
